channel.title: Welcome Note on Sharmila Upadhyaya
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome Note on Sharmila Upadhyaya

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: Hey! Welcome to my blog. I am Sharmila Upadhyaya, an Natural Language Processing Engineer. I am enthusiast machine learning explorer and trying to fit in the tech world. Besides tech and all mind boggling amazing NLP problems, I find time to sing and write poems. I occassonally travel too and will try to include my experience here. :)
